definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Homogenizing treatment process of said alloy is optimized.
sentences.chinese: 优化了该合金的均匀化热处理工艺。

sentences.english: The results show that both are caused by decarburization in heat tret - ment.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，两者均为热处理脱碳所引起。

sentences.english: HMF was produced after heating, especially in pasteurizing after filling.
sentences.chinese: HMF是在热处理后产生，特别是灌装后巴氏杀菌。

sentences.english: A heat treatment is carried out in vacuum after the formation of the thin film.
sentences.chinese: 氮化铁薄膜形成后，在真空中进行热处理。

sentences.english: We must determine the heat-treatment technical parameters, according to its influence.
sentences.chinese: 因此，必须考虑其影响来综合制订热处理工艺参数。

sentences.english: The improvement in the heat treatment technology of the stamping die for the silicon steel sheet was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了硅钢片冲模热处理工艺的改进。

sentences.english: The most common treatments applied to proteinaceous raw materials are different heat treatments.
sentences.chinese: 应用于蛋白质原料的最普通处理是不同的热处理。

sentences.english: Appropriately increasing heat-retaining time can make MMC size fine.
sentences.chinese: 热处理保温时间的适当增长可使MMC组织变得细小。

sentences.english: However, carbon and two-step annealing can promote the precipitation of oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 但是，碳和低高温两步热处理都可以促进氧沉淀。

sentences.english: The problem studied in this paper is motivated by heat-treatment operations in the pre-casting stage of steel casting manufacturing.
sentences.chinese: 本研究源于钢铁铸造业中预铸阶段的热处理作业。

sentences.english: The long neck flange should have stress-relief heat treatment after welding.
sentences.chinese: 拼接法兰应进行焊后消除应力热处理。

sentences.english: The influence of heat-treatment on the property of electro iron has researched.
sentences.chinese: 研究了热处理工艺对电铸电工纯铁性能的影响。

sentences.english: The content of sulphides does not change with the variation of tempering temperature.
sentences.chinese: 硫化物数量基本不随热处理制度变化。

sentences.english: Low-temperature electrolytic sulphurizing is a new chemical heat-treatment processing.
sentences.chinese: 低温电解渗硫是一项新型的化学热处理工艺。

sentences.english: Objective The objective of this study was to learn the influence of crystallization on mechanical properties of DGC.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨晶化热处理对牙用玻璃陶瓷力学性能的影响。

sentences.english: As when designing for the non-heat-treatable alloys, the designer must not use the parent material properties in design.
sentences.chinese: 当设计不可热处理合金时，不可使用母材性能。

definition: to straighten/(fig.) to mend one's ways
to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
to quench/to temper/to harden by quenching
